category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MECustomViewChildLinesColumnsShownPref
preference.preference_description: Specifies the columns to display in the main table on the left side of the Custom Process View in Manufacturing Process Planner. Valid Values: Accepts a list of valid Teamcenter properties that are displayed as columns in the table in the order that they appear in this list.
